sentences.en: But we love stories, and forget of anecdote is not data.
sentences.cn: 不过我们热爱故事, 而忘记了这些花边新闻、奇闻趣事并不是资料.

sentences.en: He departed from the text to tell an anecdote.
sentences.cn: 他偏离课文讲起了一则轶事.

sentences.en: He has a talent for recollection and anecdote.
sentences.cn: 他在记忆力和讲述趣闻轶事方面颇具天赋。

sentences.en: He introduced his speech with a humorous anecdote.
sentences.cn: 他讲了一则幽默轶事作为讲演的引子.

sentences.cn: 他说了一则轶闻作为讲话的引子.

sentences.en: He told me some anecdote about our English teacher.

sentences.en: Heywood is regaling the table with some anecdote about Andy.

sentences.en: I related the anecdote, whereupon he laughed heartily.
sentences.cn: 我叙述那件轶事, 他听了(马上)开怀大笑.

sentences.en: It had never been more than a family anecdote.
sentences.cn: 那不过是个家庭趣谈罢了.

sentences.en: It was a conversation pleasantly coloured with wit and anecdote.
sentences.cn: 这是一次充满妙语和轶闻的愉快交谈.

sentences.en: Pete was telling them an anecdote about their mother.

sentences.en: The image of the fox as a pest is grossly exaggerated in anecdote and folklore.
sentences.cn: 狐狸的害人精形象在传闻和民间故事中遭到严重的夸大。

sentences.en: The question sparks an anecdote about the Korean war.
